SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT340
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, who have agreed to a forward rate agreement (FRA).
The confirmed transaction is covered by an ISDA (International Swaps and Derivatives Association), Deutscher Rahmenvertrag für Finanztermingeschäfte, FRABBA (British Bankers' Association) or AFB (Association Française de Banques) Master Agreement. These agreements are either signed or under negotiation.
A money broker may also send this message to the two parties (party A and party B) for which he arranged the deal.
If there are two money brokers involved in arranging a deal between party A and party B, this message is also exchanged between these money brokers.
The message is used to confirm/notify the details of:
a) a new contract between the parties
b) an amendment to a previously agreed contract
c) the cancellation of a confirmation. It may also be used to report the details of an agreement to a trade repository.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent message with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 340 previously sent or to correct error(s) in an MT 340 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent message. Used to cancel an MT 340 previously sent or to cancel an MT 340 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: Used to send the MT 340 for the first time or to send a corrected MT 340 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 340 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, Sender and Receiver are the principals.

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: Confirmation is sent by a money broker.

Validation.Comment: Type must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T48) :

Code.Name: FIXEDFLOAT
Code.Description: Party A is the FRA buyer, ie, pays the fixed and receives the floating rate.

Code.Name: FLOATFIXED
Code.Description: Party A is the FRA seller, ie, receives the fixed and pays the floating rate.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

SwiftFieldDef.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Option.Name: H
Option.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Version must be a valid year expressed as YYYY. It must not consist entirely of zeroes (Error code(s): T50).
Type of Agreement must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47) :

Code.Name: ISDACN
Code.DetailedName: ISDA Master Agreement plus Additional Disruption Event Provisions for an Offshore Deliverable CNY Transaction

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.DetailedName: Other Master Agreement. Another type of bilateral agreement signed up front between party A and party B. The agreement can be specified in field 72 of sequence E.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Sign must not be used when Rate is equal to '0' (Error code(s): T14) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Period-From must be specified using one of the following codes (Error code(s): T48) :

Code.Name: O
Code.Description: The designated maturity is specified in field 72.

Validation.Comment: Period-To must be specified using one of the following codes (Error code(s): T48) :

Code.Name: O
Code.Description: The designated maturity is specified in field 72.

Validation.Comment: One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: EXA/EXA
Code.Description: Base Exact/Exact as per September 1994 additives to AFB definitions or 1/1.

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: The Day Count Fraction is specified in field 72.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36) :

SwiftSequence.Name: C
C
SwiftSequence.Description: Settlement Instructions for Settlement Amount Payable by Party B

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .
With option J, the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T78) :

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC or UKWN if BIC not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
One of the following codes must be used in Side Indicator (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the client leg.

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the Central Counterparty (CCP) leg.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The contract is below the clearing threshold.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The contract is above the clearing threshold.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):
The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39).
Sign ([N]) must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14).
The following code must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Option.Name: Y
Option.Description: Financial Nature of the Counterparty Indicator

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: F
Code.Description: The party is a financial counterparty

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The party is a non-financial counterparty

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The collateral is posted on a trade by trade basis

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The collateral is posted at a portfolio level

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The trade is not the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The trade is the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the counterparty is domiciled inside the EEA.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the counterparty is domiciled outside the EEA.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the reported trade does not fall under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the reported trade falls under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the contract is not directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the contract is directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In Sequence A if field 22A is AMND or CANC then, in Sequence A field 21 is Mandatory (Error code(s): D02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence A if field 22A is AMND or CANC then, in Sequence A field 21 is Mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 In Sequence A if value of subfield 1 of field 77H is ISDA then, in Sequence A field 14C is Mandatory, otherwise it is not allowed (Error code(s): E40).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence A if value of subfield 1 of field 77H is ISDA then, in Sequence A field 14C is Mandatory, otherwise it is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 (a) In Sequence A if subfield 1 of field 77H is AFB or FRABBA, then in Sequence B subsequence B1 is Mandatory. (b) In Sequence A if subfield 1 of field 77H is DERV, EMA ,OTHR or ISDA, then in Sequence B subsequence B1 is Not Allowed (Error code(s): E41).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "(a) In Sequence A if subfield 1 of field 77H is AFB or FRABBA, then in Sequence B subsequence B1 is Mandatory. (b) In Sequence A if subfield 1 of field 77H is DERV, EMA ,OTHR or ISDA, then in Sequence B subsequence B1 is Not Allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In Sequence B, if field 14F is OTHER, then Sequence E and field 72 in Sequence E is Mandatory (Error code(s): D36).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence B, if field 14F is OTHER, then Sequence E and field 72 in Sequence E is Mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If the value of the second component of the first subfield of field 38G in subsequence B2 is 'O' , then sequence E and field 72 in sequence E is Mandatory (Error code(s): D42).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the value of the second component of the first subfield of field 38G in subsequence B2 is 'O' , then sequence E and field 72 in sequence E is Mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.comment: C6 If the value of the field 14D in subsequence B2 is 'OTHER' , then sequence E and field 72 in sequence E are Mandatory (Error code(s): D37).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the value of the field 14D in subsequence B2 is 'OTHER' , then sequence E and field 72 in sequence E are Mandatory"

fieldvalidation.name: C7
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In Subsequence B2 if at least one field 22B is OTHR then sequence E and field 72 in sequence E are Mandatory (Error code(s): D69).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Subsequence B2 if at least one field 22B is OTHR then sequence E and field 72 in sequence E are Mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C8-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-1 In sequence C if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence C is not allowed (Error code(s): E35).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence C is not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: C8-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-2 In sequence D if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence D is not allowed (Error code(s): E35).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence D if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence D is not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: C8-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-3 In sequence F if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence F is not allowed (Error code(s): E35).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence F is not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: C9-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-1 Sequence A, if field 94A is Not Present or if field 94A Not equals BROK, then field 71F in Sequence E(if present) is Not Allowed (Error code(s): D74).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Sequence A, if field 94A is Not Present or if field 94A Not equals BROK, then field 71F in Sequence E(if present) is Not Allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C9-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-2 Sequence A, if field 94A equals BROK, then Sequence E is Mandatory and field 88a in Sequence E is Mandatory.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Sequence A, if field 94A equals BROK, then Sequence E is Mandatory and field 88a in Sequence E is Mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C10-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C10-1 In sequence E, field 15E may not be the only field, ie, if field 15E is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence E must be present
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E, field 15E may not be the only field, ie, if field 15E is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence E must be present"

fieldvalidation.name: C10-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C10-2 In sequence G, field 15G may not be the only field, that is, if field 15G is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence G must be present.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence G, field 15G may not be the only field, that is, if field 15G is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence G must be present (Error code(s): C98)."

fieldvalidation.name: C12
fieldvalidation.comment: In sequence G, when field 17Z is "Y" then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence G, when field 17Z is 'Y' then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-A This field consists of the bank and location codes (Error code(s): T95) (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 340. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers) (Error code(s): T96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 340. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-B Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digit of field 37M in sequence B, preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled (Error code(s): T22).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digit of field 37M in sequence B, preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: FB2-18A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB2-18A-A The value of field 18A must be equal to the number of repetitions of field 22B (Error code(s): D96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The value of field 18A must be equal to the number of repetitions of field 22B."

fieldvalidation.name: FF-18A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FF-18A-A The value of field 18A must be equal to the number of repetitions of field 30F (Error code(s): D96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The value of field 18A must be equal to the number of repetitions of field 30F."

fieldvalidation.name: FE-29A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FE-29A-A At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "At least one of the following codes should be used: /DEPT/ followed by the name of the department, /FAXT/ followed by fax number, /NAME/ followed by the name of the contact person, /PHON/ followed by the telephone number, /TELX/ followed by the telex number."

fieldvalidation.name: FE-72-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FE-72-A The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]].
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FE-72-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Any line in field 72 should not start with code /PUSI/, /PUTI/, /USI/ or /UTI/."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FG-77A-ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

FormulaFunctionDef.name: IsSwiftSequenceEmpty
FormulaFunctionDef.description: Returns false if the sequence is empty. If the sequence has atleast one valid field present, returns true.
